abstract: The chairman of Telecom Italia, Guido Rossi, resigned Friday after clashing with the company’s largest shareholder.
snippet: The chairman of Telecom Italia, Guido Rossi, resigned Friday after clashing with the company’s largest shareholder.
lead_paragraph: MILAN, April 6  The chairman of Telecom Italia, Guido Rossi, resigned Friday after clashing with the company’s largest shareholder, capping a week that began with AT&T and América Móvil offering to buy control of Telecom, the biggest Italian telecommunications company.

headline.main: Telecom Chief Quits in Italy After Clash Over Bid
headline.print_headline: Telecom Chief Quits in Italy After Clash Over Bid
